img_text: AMALA TOUR FALL 2018 . @DojaCat I called a couple people faggots when l was in high school in 2015 does this mean I don't deserve support? I've said faggot roughly like 15 thousand times in my life. Does saying faggot mean you hate gay people? Do l hate gay people? I don't think I hate gay people. Gay is ok. 8/28/18, 8:16 PM
